arts.ttl: Newport County 1-2 MK Dons: Paterson's penalty secured a hard-fought victory for The Dons
arts.sum: On the 69-minute mark, the hosts were awarded a penalty after back-to-back corners, but Bobby Kamwa was unable to level the encounter as his shot deflected off the right post and was eventually cleared. The visitors started the second half stronger, with Paterson heading home on 50 minutes to put his team into the lead for the first time in the encounter after a corner.
